toys.name: Chemistry Set
toys.description: A comprehensive chemistry set with experiments for learning basic chemical reactions and principles.

toys.name: Physics Lab
toys.description: A physics laboratory kit with experiments for understanding concepts like motion, forces, and energy.

toys.name: Math Manipulative Set
toys.description: A set of math manipulatives and tools for hands-on learning of mathematical concepts.

toys.name: Math Puzzle Game
toys.description: A fun and challenging math puzzle game that enhances problem-solving and critical thinking skills.

toys.name: Robotics Kit
toys.description: A robotics kit with components and instructions for building and programming your own robots.

toys.name: Electronics Circuit Set
toys.description: A set of electronic components for building circuits and learning about electricity and circuits.

toys.name: Building Blocks Set
toys.description: A set of building blocks for young children to develop fine motor skills and spatial awareness.

toys.name: Tool Kit for Kids
toys.description: A tool kit with child-sized tools for learning basic engineering and DIY skills.
